Home


In order to create the pendulum, First created a group to store the meshes, then I created the rods and the bobs separately and stored them one after the other (used a for loop for the 10 pendulums) in the group. I also created an array where I stored their positions and a random number between 0.01 and 0.05 that I'd use as their frequencies.
Once done with the setup, I moved into animation, where I defined pendulumAngle variable and continuously update the variable inside the animation function, and rotate the Meshes, i.e., the bobs and rods, along the z axis.
